mapper.insert: insert into tbl_pptdesc (fno, userid, ppt_kind, ppt_title, ppt_desc) values (#{fno}, #{userid}, #{ppt_kind}, #{ppt_title}, #{ppt_desc})
mapper.update: update tbl_pptdesc set ppt_kind = #{ppt_kind}, ppt_title = #{ppt_title}, ppt_desc = #{ppt_desc}, modidate = now() where pptno = #{pptno}
